scripts.start: concurrently --names "register-server,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "magenta,blue,green" "npm run Register-server" "npm run Go-server" "npm run React-client"
scripts.start-node: concurrently --names "register-server,backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "magenta,blue,green" "npm run Register-server" "npm run Node-server" "npm run React-client"
scripts.install-all: npm run install-node-server && npm run install-go-server && npm run install-react && npm run install-register && npm install concurrently
